query: Oregon Coast Gravel Epic gravel race Waldport

videos.title: Oregon Coast Gravel Epic, Waldport, OR. May 3rd, 2025
videos.description:
Description:
The first of two days of gravel bike racing on the beautiful Central Oregon Coast. This is the short route, the "Son of Abomination" course.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
✅ SUBSCRIBE to My YouTube Channel HERE
https://www.youtube.com/@chipweinert3864  
🔔TURN ON ALL NOTIFICATIONS BELL🔔

videos.title: West Coast Epic Gravel Race 2025
videos.description: Mudslinger gravel race out of Waldport, Oregon. May 3, 2025

videos.title: West Coast Gravl 2025 - Day 2 of a gravel racing weekend on the Oregon Coast
videos.description:
Description: After Saturday's Oregon Coast Gravel Epic in Waldport, bicycle racers (and non-racers) gathered in the lovely Oregon coastal community of Yachats for day two of a gravel weekend and the annual West Coast Gravl event.

Your dogs will love you even more if you get them some treats made by K9 Crack  https://www.k9crack.com/
The treats are delicious (at least my dogs think so), healthy, and handmade in Oregon by some awesome folks who also ride bikes.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
✅ SUBSCRIBE to My YouTube Channel HERE
https://www.youtube.com/@chipweinert3864  
🔔TURN ON ALL NOTIFICATIONS BELL🔔

"LIFE IS TWICE AS GOOD ON TWO WHEELS"

videos.title: Start of the 2023 Oregon Coast Gravel Epic
videos.description: 15-20% up Cedar Street in Waldport as we kicked off the 11th annual Oregon Coast Gravel Epic. A 65% gravel route is ahead!

videos.title: Oregon Coast Gravel Epic 2015 OR Triple Crown
videos.description:
Oregon Coast Gravel Epic 2015 in Waldport, Oregon.  September 26th, 2015. Part of the Oregon Triple Crown of bicycle racing. 
The Abomination was a 70 mile course with nearly 9000 feet of vertical climbs, and a fun ride, note the tandem - or tri-dem? 2.5 riders pull through the finish.
http://www.bicycleattorney.com is the website of Personal Injury Attorney Mike Colbach proud to be the main sponsor of BicycleAttorney.,com bicycle racing team.
